<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Set Approvers in Service Activity</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var performerCriteriaMap = {};
migratePerformerCriteria();

function migratePerformerCriteria() {
    var approvalOptionGr = new GlideRecord(WSDCaseConstants.TABLES.APPROVAL_OPTION);
    if (approvalOptionGr.isValid()) {
        createPerformerCriteriaRecords();
        copyApproversFromApproversfromcase();
    }
}

function createPerformerCriteriaRecords() {
    gs.info('createPerformerCriteriaRecords - Starting fix script to create Performer Criteria records from Approval option records.');
    var approvalOptionGr = new GlideRecord(WSDCaseConstants.TABLES.APPROVAL_OPTION);
    approvalOptionGr.query();
    while (approvalOptionGr.next()) {
        var performerCriteriaDetails = {};
        performerCriteriaDetails.name = approvalOptionGr.name;
        performerCriteriaDetails.scope = approvalOptionGr.sys_scope;
        performerCriteriaDetails.active = approvalOptionGr.active;
        performerCriteriaDetails.is_dynamic = true;
        performerCriteriaDetails.table = approvalOptionGr.case_table;
        performerCriteriaDetails.user_field = approvalOptionGr.user_field;
        performerCriteriaDetails.sys_domain = approvalOptionGr.sys_domain;

        var approvalOptionId = approvalOptionGr.getUniqueValue();
        var performerCriteriaId = new sn_wsd_core.WPApprovalUtils().insertPerformerCriteria(performerCriteriaDetails);
        if (!gs.nil(performerCriteriaId))
            performerCriteriaMap[approvalOptionId] = performerCriteriaId;
        else
            gs.error('createPerformerCriteriaRecords - Error while generating  Performer Criteria record for Approval option record with Id: ' + approvalOptionId);
    }
    gs.info('createPerformerCriteriaRecords - Finishing fix script to create Performer Criteria records from Approval option records.');
}

function copyApproversFromApproversfromcase() {
    gs.info('copyApproversFromApproversfromcase - Starting fix script to populate approvers field value from approvers from case field in Workplace Service Activity.');
    var wpServiceActivityGr = new GlideRecord(WSDCaseConstants.TABLES.SERVICE_ACTIVITY);
    wpServiceActivityGr.getValue('activity_type', WSDCaseConstants.ACTIVITY_TYPE.APPROVAL);
    wpServiceActivityGr.query();
    while (wpServiceActivityGr.next()) {
        var approvers = [];
        var caseApprovers = wpServiceActivityGr.approvers_from_case.toString().split(',');

        for (var i = 0; i < caseApprovers.length; i++)
            approvers.push(performerCriteriaMap[caseApprovers[i]]);

        wpServiceActivityGr.approvers = approvers.join(',');
        wpServiceActivityGr.update();
    }
    gs.info('copyApproversFromApproversfromcase - Finishing fix script to populate approvers field value from approvers from case field in Workplace Service Activity.');
}

function getApprovers() {

}]]></script>
